Episodes.Title: The Proof Is in the Penis
Episodes.Plot: In an attempt to get Sarah to ?man up?, Laura falsely informs her that she was born with both a penis and a vagina. Brian and Steve are haunted by the ghost of Mr. Jenkins.

Episodes.Title: The Silverman and the Pillows
Episodes.Plot: After Sarah's morning brunch at Romanski's is interrupted by a children's book reading, Sarah goes on a crusade of her own to show how easy it is to make children's books and television. Jay and his "anti-Sarah" support group, square off with Sarah on Real Time with Bill Maher. Laura informs Brian and Steve that their balls have an unpleasant odor.

Episodes.Title: A Slip Slope
Episodes.Plot: Sarah sues "Home Alone", the movie, for influencing her to accidentally murder her new neighbor. Her eloquent case about the dangerous influence of entertainment leads her to the position of official censor of Valley Village television. Brian seeks revenge on a bird who repeatedly shits on his head.

Episodes.Title: Nightmayor
Episodes.Plot: Sarah is sick of hearing about the upcoming mayoral election, so she amuses herself by campaigning for a fake write-in candidate whom she calls, "May Kadoody." An actual May Kadoody steps forward when her name is, shockingly, announced as the winner. Kadoody outlaws brunch and gay marriage, interfering with Steve's dream of marrying Brian.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, drug use & sexual material

Episodes.Title: Smellin' of Troy
Episodes.Plot: Sarah reconnects with her childhood imaginary friend, Troy, who lures into a life of sex and drugs. After Brian refuses to let Steve play in his band, Steve creates a song that mocks Brian, and gains immense popularity on the internet.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, drug use & sexual material

Episodes.Title: A Fairly Attractive Mind
Episodes.Plot: Sarah has the mistaken epiphany that she is retarded, and tries to use her disability to inspire people. Brian and Steve accidentally bump heads while trying to pick up a magical dragon phone and switch bodies.

Episodes.Title: Songs in the Key of Yuck
Episodes.Plot: Sarah and Steve go to a jam band concert where Sarah convinces all of the fans that they are tripping.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, drug use & sexual material

Episodes.Title: Just Breve
Episodes.Plot: Sarah narrates the story of Steve creating a baby robot.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, drug use & sexual material

Episodes.Title: A Good Van is Hard to Find
Episodes.Plot: Brian and Steve have a stand-off to decide who will do the laundry.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language, drug use & sexual material

Episodes.Title: Wowschwitz
Episodes.Plot: Laura and Sarah mount dueling Holocaust memorials.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: M Violence & content that may disturb
